headline.main: Why It's So Important to Keep Moving
headline.print_headline: Phys Ed: To Avoid the Pitfalls of Inactivity, Just Walk Away

docs.abstract: Inactivity produced spikes in blood sugar levels in healthy young volunteers, which may help explain why sedentary behavior raises the risk of Type 2 diabetes and heart disease.
docs.snippet: Inactivity produced spikes in blood sugar levels in healthy young volunteers, which may help explain why sedentary behavior raises the risk of Type 2 diabetes and heart disease.
